attributes.action: raise awareness of pernicious anaemia and importance of blood tests to establish this condition before health is permanently damaged
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: pernicious anaemia is a serious condition if it is not diagnosed early which will avoid permanent neurological damage due lack of red blood cells.if left too long can result in loss of feeling in hands and feet and permanent spinal degeneration. gps should be made aware of dangers involved through lack of blood testing.also there is a lack of general advice on b12 injections. currently every 3 months. this does not suit everybody due to late diagnosis more frequent injections should be given as b12 does not always last this long.more publicity required on symptoms of this illness i.e. extreme fatigue fainting dizziness muscle weakness palpitations loss of feelong in fingers and feet dehydration mental confusion depression to list a few.
